view

Class Boats

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.Boats

  • public class Boats
extends java.lang.Object
    The view package class which handles all the user's input/output operations about adding and updating boats.
    Author:
    Mouayed Fakhreldin, Abdilrahman Duale, Genet Shiferaw
